snippet: The modernist painter Kazimir Malevich has suffered in the ups and downs of Russian history. But last week, the Group of 20 paid him a visual compliment.
abstract: Editorial notes grave of Russian artist Kazimir Malevich, whose work inspired the logo for Group of 20 meeting in St Petersburg, Russia, has reportedly been covered over for a new luxury housing complex; contends it is a sign that art cannot lie in the way of commerce in the new boom-time Russia.
lead_paragraph: The modernist painter Kazimir Malevich has suffered in the ups and downs of Russian history. But last week, the Group of 20 paid him a visual compliment.
